name: こめホプ - A Grain of Hope
name_original: こめホプ - A Grain of Hope
description:
A Grain of Hope (こめホプ) is an atmospheric platformer about a servant of the Rice God who will do anything to revive the abandoned shrine. Without offerings, the Rice God is becoming weak, so it is up to the rice servant to collect offerings for the shrine!

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • 'Space' to jump
  • 'X' to shoot

Team:

Jib Leekitwattana: Programmer, Level Design & Story

Nicole Polidore: Game Art / Animation, Level Design, & Story
